title: Lake Chelan National Recreation Area: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Reservations   CAR CAMPING RESERVATIONS Car camping reservations are available for the group sites at Newhalem Creek and Upper and Lower Goodell Creek campgrounds. Reservations for Individual sites are available in Loops A, B and C at Newhalem Creek Campground. Reservations can be made online at Recreation.gov or by phone at 1-877-444-6777. You may use the links below for the specific campgrounds. Reservations are not available for backcountry (boat-in or wilderness) camping.   Newhalem Campground Lower Goodell Group Campground Upper Goodell Group Campground  Â    Permits   Backcountry Permits   Commercial Use Permits
